entity.name: Scandal
entity.description: Olivia Pope, a former media relations consultant to the president, is ready to move on with her life and opens her own crisis-management firm, but she can't seem to shake ties with her past. Pope's staff includes womaniser-turned-family man Stephen Finch, slick litigator Harrison Wright and hacker extraordinaire Huck. As she moves forward it becomes clear that while her staffers may specialise in cleaning up the lives of other people, they can't seem to do the same for themselves.

@StinkStopthe @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgencyMids My hunch is that they have been doing that here too to release the gas. The agencies who are checking how these landfill sites are being managed need to be more robust. Are the operators breaking the law? This needs to be investigated.

A new Severn Trent sign on the footbridge over Hawthorn Brook at Witton Lakes. First time WatersideCare have seen this one @stwater @EnvAgencyMids @CRTWestMidlands @KeepBritainTidy @of_fowl https://t.co/2sMTmdUwLa

text: @StinkStopthe @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgencyMids My theory is they are opening the wellheads on the gas extraction wells at night and releasing all the toxic gas and odours (despicable!). They should have a proper gas management system in place - to perhaps turn it into renewable energy.
